data.content:
Vi (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Vi, the Piltover Enforcer, is a formidable champion in the popular online game League of Legends. As one of the game's original champions, Vi has become a fan favorite with her unique abilities and charismatic personality. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Vi's default costume and explore all the intricate details of her appearance.

Vi's default skin is the original costume that players are introduced to when they first select her as their champion. It showcases her iconic look, featuring a pair of powerful gauntlets and a distinctive hextech-powered suit. The costume perfectly captures Vi's rebellious and tough nature, reflecting her role as a law enforcement officer in the city of Piltover.

Vi's gauntlets are a central part of her character design, symbolizing her immense strength and her signature ability, Vault Breaker. These gauntlets are not only a weapon but also a tool that allows her to unleash devastating punches and deliver powerful blows to her enemies. The gauntlets are adorned with intricate details, including gears and mechanical components, showcasing the advanced technology of Piltover.

Vi's hextech-powered suit is another key element of her default appearance. The suit is a combination of advanced technology and steampunk aesthetics, reflecting the unique blend of magic and machinery that defines the world of League of Legends. The suit provides Vi with enhanced durability and protection, allowing her to withstand even the most intense battles.

Vi's default skin perfectly captures her personality and backstory. As a former criminal turned law enforcer, Vi is known for her rebellious and independent nature. Her appearance reflects this, with her rugged and edgy style. Her short, spiky hair and piercing blue eyes add to her fierce and determined look, while her tattoos and facial markings hint at her troubled past.

Vi's story within the League of Legends universe is an intriguing one. Born and raised in the underbelly of Piltover, Vi grew up on the streets, surviving through her wits and her fists. She was eventually taken in by Caitlyn, the Sheriff of Piltover, who recognized her potential and offered her a chance at redemption.

Vi joined Caitlyn in her fight against crime and corruption, becoming an invaluable asset to the law enforcement of Piltover. With her incredible strength and unwavering determination, Vi quickly rose through the ranks, earning a reputation as a fearsome enforcer. Her unique abilities, including her powerful punches and her ability to charge through obstacles with Vault Breaker, make her a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

In the game, Vi is classified as a melee fighter, excelling in close-quarters combat. Her high damage output and crowd control abilities make her a formidable opponent, capable of taking down even the toughest of enemies. However, her reliance on her abilities and lack of long-range attacks can leave her vulnerable in certain situations.

Vi's default skin is just one of the many appearances available for this beloved champion. Players have the option to unlock and purchase additional skins for Vi, each offering a unique visual and thematic twist. Whether it's the futuristic aesthetics of Neon Strike Vi or the gritty charm of Officer Vi, there is a skin to suit every player's taste.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Vi's appearances, allowing you to explore the various options and choose the perfect look for your champion. So gear up, charge your gauntlets, and get ready to unleash the power of Vi, the Piltover Enforcer!

Vi: The Piltover Enforcer

Release Date: December 19, 2012

Vi, also known as the Piltover Enforcer, is a powerful and relentless champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With her mechanical gauntlets and indomitable spirit, Vi has become a fan-favorite character since her release on December 19, 2012. In this article, we will delve into Vi's story, her strengths and weaknesses, her background in the game, and her significant place in the League of Legends universe.

Background Story

Vi hails from the city of Piltover, a technologically advanced metropolis known for its innovation and progress. Growing up in the underbelly of the city, Vi learned to fend for herself at a young age. She became a skilled street brawler, using her fists to survive in the dangerous streets of Piltover.

One fateful day, Vi crossed paths with Caitlyn, the Sheriff of Piltover. Impressed by Vi's raw strength and determination, Caitlyn offered her a chance to join the Wardens, a group of enforcers dedicated to maintaining order in the city. Vi accepted the offer, seeing it as an opportunity to make a difference and protect the innocent.

Equipped with her iconic Hextech gauntlets, Vi became a force to be reckoned with. These powerful mechanical gloves enhance her natural strength, allowing her to deliver devastating punches and unleash explosive abilities. With her gauntlets, Vi can punch through walls, knock enemies into the air, and unleash a barrage of punches that leave her opponents reeling.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Vi's playstyle revolves around her ability to engage and disrupt the enemy team. She excels at diving into the heart of the battle, locking down high-priority targets, and dealing significant damage. Her kit offers a mix of burst damage, crowd control, and mobility, making her a versatile champion in various team compositions.

One of Vi's greatest strengths is her ability to initiate fights with her ultimate ability, Assault and Battery. This ability allows her to dash towards an enemy champion, knocking them up and dealing massive damage. It can be a game-changer in team fights, catching opponents off guard and allowing her team to follow up with their own abilities.

Vi's passive ability, Blast Shield, provides her with a shield whenever she activates an ability. This shield not only grants her additional survivability but also synergizes well with her aggressive playstyle. It allows her to dive into the enemy team, absorb damage, and come out on top.

However, Vi does have her weaknesses. Her reliance on engaging and diving into the enemy team leaves her vulnerable to crowd control and kiting. Champions with strong disengage tools or long-range abilities can make it difficult for Vi to reach her intended targets. Additionally, her abilities have relatively high cooldowns, meaning she needs to time her engages carefully to maximize her impact.

Vi in the Game

Vi has found her place in the game as a jungler and a top laner. Her kit provides her with the tools necessary to clear jungle camps efficiently and gank lanes with devastating force. Her ability to lock down targets and deal burst damage makes her a formidable threat in the early and mid-game.

As a top laner, Vi can be a dominant force in one-on-one matchups. Her ability to engage and burst down opponents makes her a nightmare for squishy champions. With proper vision control and map awareness, Vi can roam and impact other lanes, snowballing the game in her team's favor.

Vi's popularity in the game has led to the creation of various skins that allow players to customize her appearance. From the classic Officer Vi skin, where she takes on the role of a law enforcement officer, to the Neon Strike Vi skin, which gives her a futuristic and vibrant look, players have a range of options to choose from to suit their personal style.

On our website, you can access detailed information and videos showcasing all of Vi's skins. Whether you prefer the classic look or want to explore the alternative options, our page provides a comprehensive overview of Vi's skins, allowing you to make an informed decision on which one to add to your collection.

In conclusion, Vi is a beloved champion in League of Legends, known for her explosive playstyle, engaging story, and iconic gauntlets. Her strengths lie in her ability to initiate fights, lock down targets, and deal significant damage. However, she does have weaknesses that can be exploited by skilled opponents. Whether you choose to play her as a jungler or a top laner, Vi's impact on the game is undeniable. So gear up, charge your gauntlets, and get ready to unleash chaos on the Fields of Justice with Vi, the Piltover Enforcer!

Vi (Heartache Vi)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 20, 2014

Heartache Vi is a stunning skin that brings a touch of romance to the fierce and powerful champion, Vi. Released on November 20, 2014, this skin is available for 1350 RP. With its unique design and captivating animations, Heartache Vi offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the game.

The Heartache Vi skin transforms Vi into a heartbreaker, with a new look that perfectly captures the essence of love and heartache. Vi's usual tough and rugged appearance is replaced with a more elegant and refined style. She wears a sleek black leather jacket adorned with red hearts, symbolizing the pain and passion of love. Her gauntlets are also modified, featuring heart-shaped designs that add a touch of charm to her powerful punches.

One of the most notable features of Heartache Vi is her recall animation. When Vi recalls, she sits on a heart-shaped bench and pulls out a heart-shaped locket, reminiscing about lost love. This animation adds an emotional depth to the character, showcasing her vulnerable side amidst her tough exterior.

In addition to the visual changes, Heartache Vi also brings new sound effects and voice lines. Vi's voice becomes softer and more melancholic, reflecting the theme of heartache. Her abilities also receive unique visual and sound effects, enhancing the overall experience of playing with this skin.

Vi, the Piltover Enforcer, is a powerful and versatile champion in League of Legends. With her brute strength and determination, she excels in close-quarters combat, making her a formidable force on the battlefield. Vi's abilities revolve around her powerful gauntlets, allowing her to deliver devastating punches and disrupt her enemies.

Vi's passive ability, Blast Shield, grants her a shield whenever she activates an ability, providing her with additional survivability in fights. Her Q ability, Vault Breaker, allows her to charge up a punch and dash forward, damaging and knocking up enemies in her path. This ability is a great initiation tool and can catch opponents off guard.

Her W ability, Denting Blows, empowers her basic attacks, dealing bonus damage and reducing the target's armor. This ability makes Vi a strong duelist, capable of shredding through tanks and squishy targets alike. Vi's E ability, Excessive Force, allows her to deliver a powerful punch in a cone-shaped area, damaging all enemies hit. This ability is great for clearing waves and dealing AoE damage in team fights.

Vi's ultimate ability, Assault and Battery, is a game-changer. She charges towards an enemy champion, knocking them up and suppressing them for a brief period. This ability is perfect for catching out priority targets or initiating team fights. It can turn the tide of battle in Vi's favor and secure crucial kills for her team.

In the lore of League of Legends, Vi hails from Piltover, a city known for its technological advancements. She grew up on the streets, surviving by her wits and fists. Vi's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is clear that she has a strong sense of justice and a desire to protect the innocent.

Vi's place in the game is that of a bruiser and an initiator. She excels in diving into the enemy team, disrupting their formation, and isolating key targets. Her ability to lock down and eliminate high-priority champions makes her a valuable asset in team fights. However, Vi's all-in playstyle leaves her vulnerable to crowd control and burst damage, requiring careful positioning and timing to maximize her effectiveness.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos showcasing Vi's various appearances, including the Heartache Vi skin. Whether you're a fan of her classic look or want to explore the different themes and styles available, this page is your go-to resource for all things Vi.

Vi (PsyOps Vi)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: September 17, 2020

PsyOps Vi is a stunning skin that brings a whole new level of intensity to the Piltover Enforcer. Released on September 17, 2020, this skin is part of the PsyOps skin line, which features champions who have been augmented with cybernetic enhancements to fight against a powerful enemy force known as the

Vi, the brash and fearless enforcer, has always been known for her hard-hitting punches and explosive personality. With the PsyOps Vi skin, she takes on a futuristic and cybernetic appearance, ready to take down any enemy that stands in her way.

The PsyOps Vi skin features a sleek and high-tech design, with glowing neon accents and a vibrant color scheme. Her gauntlets are transformed into powerful cybernetic arms, pulsating with energy. Her iconic hextech-powered gloves are replaced with advanced technology, giving her an even more formidable presence on the battlefield.

One of the standout features of the PsyOps Vi skin is her new ultimate ability, Assault and Battery. When Vi activates her ultimate, she charges forward with incredible force, leaving behind a trail of neon energy. The impact of her attack creates a shockwave, causing the ground to crack and shatter beneath her enemies. It's a visually stunning and impactful ability that perfectly complements the theme of the skin.

In addition to her new ultimate ability, PsyOps Vi also features new visual effects for her abilities, including her Q ability, Vault Breaker, and her W ability, Denting Blows. These effects further enhance the futuristic and cybernetic theme of the skin, making each ability feel even more powerful and impactful.

As for Vi's story within the League of Legends universe, she is a champion who hails from Piltover, a city known for its technological advancements. Vi grew up on the streets, using her fists to survive and protect her sister, Jinx. She eventually joined the Wardens of Piltover, a group of enforcers who maintain order in the city.

Vi's strength lies in her raw power and ability to initiate fights. With her Q ability, Vault Breaker, she charges up a powerful punch, dashing forward and knocking aside any enemies in her path. This ability can be used to engage or disengage from fights, making her a versatile champion in various situations.

Her W ability, Denting Blows, allows her basic attacks to deal bonus damage and shred the enemy's armor. This ability makes her a formidable duelist, capable of taking down even the tankiest of opponents. It also synergizes well with her passive ability, Blast Shield, which grants her a shield whenever she activates an ability.

Vi's ultimate ability, Assault and Battery, is a game-changer. She leaps onto an enemy champion, knocking them up and dealing massive damage. This ability can be used to initiate team fights or pick off priority targets, making her a valuable asset to any team composition.

However, Vi does have her weaknesses. She lacks long-range abilities, making her vulnerable to poke and kiting champions. Additionally, her abilities have relatively high cooldowns, so timing and decision-making are crucial when playing her.

Overall, Vi is a champion who excels in close-quarters combat and thrives in chaotic team fights. Her raw power and ability to initiate fights make her a force to be reckoned with on the Rift.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos about Vi's various appearances, including the PsyOps Vi skin. Whether you're a fan of her classic look or want to explore the futuristic world of PsyOps, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

Vi (Debonair Vi)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 20, 2014

Debonair Vi is a stylish and sophisticated skin for the popular League of Legends champion, Vi. Released on November 20, 2014, this skin offers players a fresh and elegant take on the Piltover Enforcer. With its sleek design and refined animations, Debonair Vi is a must-have for fans of the champion.

The Debonair Vi skin transforms the rough and tough brawler into a dapper and debonair lady. Vi's usual punk-inspired attire is replaced with a more refined and fashionable ensemble. She dons a sleek black suit with a white dress shirt, complete with a red tie. Her gauntlets are replaced with elegant white gloves, and her hair is styled into a neat bob. This skin truly showcases Vi's ability to be both fierce and fashionable.

Not only does Debonair Vi change her appearance, but it also brings new animations and effects to the game. Her abilities are given a touch of elegance, with refined particle effects and smoother animations. Her Q ability, Vault Breaker, now features a stylish dash with a trail of rose petals. Her W ability, Denting Blows, showcases a more refined and precise punch. Her E ability, Excessive Force, is transformed into a graceful swipe with a trail of shimmering particles. Finally, her ultimate ability, Assault and Battery, is enhanced with a burst of confetti upon impact.

Vi's story in League of Legends is one of determination and strength. Hailing from the city of Piltover, Vi is a former criminal who turned her life around to become a respected enforcer of the law. With her powerful gauntlets, she fights to maintain order and protect the innocent. Vi's past is shrouded in mystery, but her unwavering resolve and relentless pursuit of justice make her a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

In the game, Vi is known for her high burst damage and crowd control abilities. Her Q ability, Vault Breaker, allows her to charge up a powerful punch and dash towards her enemies, dealing damage and knocking them up. Her W ability, Denting Blows, empowers her basic attacks, shredding through her opponents' armor and dealing bonus damage. Vi's E ability, Excessive Force, allows her to unleash a shockwave, damaging all enemies in a cone in front of her. Finally, her ultimate ability, Assault and Battery, lets her dash towards a single enemy champion, knocking them up and dealing massive damage.

Vi's strengths lie in her ability to quickly burst down squishy targets and lock down priority targets with her crowd control. Her high mobility and gap-closing potential make her a formidable threat in team fights. However, Vi's reliance on her abilities for damage leaves her vulnerable if her abilities are on cooldown. Additionally, her lack of sustained damage makes her less effective against tanky opponents.

Overall, Vi is a versatile champion who excels at diving into the enemy backline and disrupting their carries. Her combination of damage and crowd control makes her a valuable asset to any team composition. Whether you prefer her classic look or the debonair elegance of the Debonair Vi skin, Vi is a champion that demands attention and respect.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Vi's appearances in League of Legends. From her classic look to her various skins, you can explore the different styles and themes that Riot Games has created for this beloved champion. Whether you're a fan of her punk-inspired persona or the refined elegance of Debonair Vi, there's a skin for every taste.

Vi (Demon Vi)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: October 29, 2013

Vi, the Piltover Enforcer, is a formidable champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for her brute strength and relentless determination, Vi has become a fan favorite since her release in 2012. With her powerful gauntlets and explosive abilities, she dominates the battlefield, leaving her enemies in awe.

One of Vi's most iconic skins is

which was released on October 29, 2013. This skin transforms Vi into a fearsome demon, enhancing her already intimidating presence on the Rift. Let's delve into the story behind this skin and explore all the intricate details that make it a must-have for Vi enthusiasts.

The Story of Demon Vi

In the world of League of Legends, the skin

represents a darker side of Vi's personality. It portrays her as a demonic entity, consumed by her inner rage and power. The skin features Vi adorned in demonic armor, with fiery red eyes and glowing tattoos that symbolize her connection to the underworld.

The concept behind Demon Vi is to showcase Vi's raw strength and her willingness to tap into her darker side to achieve victory. The skin's design perfectly captures this essence, making it a visually striking and captivating addition to Vi's collection.

Details of the Costume

Demon Vi's costume is a masterful blend of demonic aesthetics and Vi's signature style. The skin replaces her usual gauntlets with demonic claws, imbued with dark energy. These claws leave a trail of fiery particles as Vi moves, adding an extra layer of intimidation to her attacks.

Her armor is intricately designed, featuring demonic spikes and sharp edges that reflect her aggressive nature. The armor is adorned with glowing runes and symbols, representing her connection to the demonic realm. The fiery red eyes and tattoos further enhance the demonic theme, giving Vi an otherworldly appearance.

Additionally, Demon Vi's abilities receive a demonic makeover. Her Q ability, Vault Breaker, now leaves behind a trail of dark energy as she charges towards her enemies. Her W ability, Denting Blows, manifests as a burst of demonic energy upon activation, visually emphasizing the power behind her strikes.

Vi's ultimate ability, Assault and Battery, is perhaps the most visually impressive aspect of the skin. When activated, Vi transforms into a massive demonic figure, crashing down on her target with devastating force. The impact creates a fiery explosion, leaving her enemies in ruins.

Vi's Story and Role in the Game

Vi's story within the League of Legends universe is as captivating as her appearance. Hailing from the city of Piltover, Vi grew up in the harsh streets, surviving through her wits and brawn. She eventually found her place as an enforcer, working alongside Caitlyn, the Sheriff of Piltover, to maintain order in the city.

Vi's strength lies in her ability to engage and disrupt the enemy team. Her Q ability allows her to charge into battle, knocking aside anyone in her path. Her W ability empowers her basic attacks, shredding through enemy armor and dealing significant damage. Her E ability, Excessive Force, allows her to deliver devastating blows in quick succession.

However, Vi does have her weaknesses. She lacks long-range abilities, making her vulnerable to poke and kiting. Additionally, her ultimate ability, while powerful, requires her to be in close proximity to her target, leaving her susceptible to crowd control and burst damage.

Despite her weaknesses, Vi remains a popular pick in the game due to her high damage output and ability to initiate team fights. Her playstyle rewards aggressive and calculated engages, making her a favorite among players who enjoy diving into the heart of the action.

Explore Vi's Appearances

If you're interested in exploring all of Vi's appearances in League of Legends, you've come to the right place. On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing Vi's various skins, including the fearsome Demon Vi. Whether you prefer her classic look or want to embrace her demonic side, Vi offers a range of options to suit your playstyle and aesthetic preferences.

So, dive into the world of Vi and unleash her explosive power on the Rift. Whether you choose to don the Demon Vi skin or opt for another appearance, one thing is for certain – Vi will leave a lasting impression on both her allies and enemies.

Vi (Warring Kingdoms Vi)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: January 28, 2014

Warring Kingdoms Vi is a stunning skin that brings a touch of ancient Chinese culture to the fierce and powerful champion, Vi. Released on January 28, 2014, this skin is part of the Warring Kingdoms skin line, which features champions dressed in traditional Chinese attire, inspired by the historical Three Kingdoms period.

Vi, the Piltover Enforcer, is known for her brute strength, explosive punches, and relentless pursuit of justice. With her Warring Kingdoms skin, she takes on a whole new look, embracing the elegance and grandeur of ancient China.

Warring Kingdoms Vi features a beautifully designed armor, adorned with intricate golden details and vibrant red accents. Her gauntlets are transformed into ornate dragon heads, symbolizing power and strength. The dragon motif is further emphasized by the dragon-shaped shoulder pads and the dragon scale patterns on her armor.

Vi's traditional Chinese attire includes a flowing red robe with golden trimmings, giving her a regal and commanding presence on the battlefield. Her hair is styled in an elegant updo, held together by golden hairpins, adding to her overall majestic appearance.

One of the most striking aspects of Warring Kingdoms Vi is her new recall animation. When she recalls, she summons a massive dragon that wraps around her, symbolizing her connection to the mythical creature and her indomitable spirit.

As for her abilities, Warring Kingdoms Vi brings a unique twist to her usual explosive punches. Her Q ability, Vault Breaker, now features a dragon-shaped projectile, leaving a trail of dragon scales as it charges towards her enemies. Her W ability, Denting Blows, showcases a dragon symbol above her target, signifying the power of her strikes. Additionally, her ultimate ability, Assault and Battery, is accompanied by a dragon roar, adding an extra layer of intensity to her devastating charge.

Now, let's delve into the story of Vi and her place in the League of Legends universe. Vi, also known as Vi the Piltover Enforcer, hails from the city of Piltover, a technologically advanced metropolis. She is a former criminal who turned her life around and now fights for justice alongside her partner, Caitlyn, as a member of the Wardens of Piltover.

Vi's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is known that she grew up on the streets of Piltover, surviving through her wits and her fists. She eventually found herself in trouble with the law, but instead of being locked away, she was given a chance to redeem herself. Vi was recruited by Caitlyn to join the Wardens of Piltover, a group dedicated to maintaining order and protecting the city from criminals and threats.

Vi's strength lies in her raw power and her ability to dish out devastating blows. Her signature ability, Vault Breaker, allows her to charge up a powerful punch, knocking aside enemies and dealing damage in a line. Combined with her Denting Blows, which empowers her basic attacks to shred through enemy armor, Vi becomes a formidable force on the battlefield.

However, Vi does have her weaknesses. She lacks long-range abilities, making her vulnerable to champions who can poke from a distance. Additionally, her ultimate ability, Assault and Battery, requires her to get up close and personal with her target, leaving her exposed to counterattacks if not executed carefully.

In the world of League of Legends, Vi is a popular pick for players who enjoy a high-impact, brawler playstyle. Her ability to initiate fights, lock down priority targets, and deal massive damage makes her a valuable asset to any team composition.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Vi, including her base skin and other alternate skins. Whether you prefer the fierce and determined look of Warring Kingdoms Vi or want to explore her other personas, this page will provide you with all the details you need to fully embrace the power of Vi, the Piltover Enforcer.

Vi (Neon Strike Vi)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 29, 2013

Neon Strike Vi is a futuristic and electrifying skin for the beloved champion Vi in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on August 29, 2013, and has since become a fan-favorite due to its unique design and vibrant colors. Priced at 1350 RP, Neon Strike Vi offers players a visually stunning experience that perfectly complements Vi's explosive personality and playstyle.

The Story of Neon Strike Vi

In the world of League of Legends, Neon Strike Vi is a member of the elite Neon Strike force, a group of champions who fight for justice and protect the innocent. Clad in a high-tech power suit, Vi is ready to bring the thunder and deliver justice to those who dare to oppose her.

The Neon Strike Vi skin features a complete overhaul of Vi's appearance, transforming her into a futuristic law enforcer. Her iconic gauntlets are replaced with sleek, neon-infused power gloves that crackle with energy. Her armor is upgraded with glowing neon accents, giving her a distinct and eye-catching look. The skin also introduces new visual effects, such as electrifying particle effects for her abilities, making her punches and explosions even more impactful.

One of the standout features of the Neon Strike Vi skin is her recall animation. When Vi recalls, she summons a holographic motorcycle that materializes beneath her, allowing her to ride off into the distance in style. This recall animation perfectly captures the essence of Vi's rebellious and adventurous personality.

Overall, the Neon Strike Vi skin offers players a fresh and exciting take on the champion, immersing them in a futuristic world where Vi is the ultimate enforcer of justice.

Vi: The Piltover Enforcer

Vi, also known as the Piltover Enforcer, is a powerful and relentless champion in League of Legends. Hailing from the city of Piltover, Vi is a former criminal who turned her life around to become a force for good. With her massive gauntlets and explosive abilities, Vi is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

Vi's playstyle revolves around her ability to engage enemies and deal massive amounts of damage. Her passive ability, Blast Shield, grants her a shield whenever she activates an ability, allowing her to soak up damage and stay in the fight. Her Q ability, Vault Breaker, allows her to charge up a devastating punch, knocking back and damaging any enemies in her path. Her W ability, Denting Blows, empowers her basic attacks, shredding through enemy armor and dealing bonus damage. Vi's E ability, Excessive Force, allows her to unleash a shockwave, damaging all enemies in a cone in front of her. Finally, her ultimate ability, Assault and Battery, allows her to dash towards an enemy champion, knocking them up and dealing massive damage.

Vi's strengths lie in her ability to initiate fights and lock down priority targets. With her ultimate ability, she can single out key enemies and eliminate them quickly, turning the tide of team fights in her team's favor. Her high burst damage and crowd control make her a formidable opponent in both solo and team play.

However, Vi does have her weaknesses. She is relatively immobile compared to some other champions, making her susceptible to crowd control and kiting. Additionally, her abilities have relatively long cooldowns, so timing and resource management are crucial when playing Vi. Finally, her reliance on getting up close and personal with enemies puts her at risk of being burst down by high-damage champions.

In the lore of League of Legends, Vi has a rich backstory that intertwines with other champions from Piltover and Zaun. She is known for her partnership with Caitlyn, the Sheriff of Piltover, as they work together to maintain order and protect the city. Vi's rebellious nature and determination to bring justice to the streets of Piltover make her a beloved character among players.

Explore Vi's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Vi and her various appearances in League of Legends, you can find detailed information and videos on our website. From her classic look to the electrifying Neon Strike Vi skin, you can witness the evolution of this iconic champion and discover the skins that best suit your playstyle.

Whether you prefer the raw power of her base form or the futuristic flair of Neon Strike Vi, Vi is a champion that embodies strength, determination, and justice. So gear up, charge your gauntlets, and join Vi on her quest to bring order to the chaotic world of League of Legends!

Vi (Arcane Vi)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 25, 2021

Arcane Vi is a stunning skin that brings a touch of magic and mystique to the Piltover Enforcer. With her sleek and elegant design, this skin transforms Vi into a powerful arcane warrior, ready to unleash her magical abilities on the Rift. Released on November 25, 2021, Arcane Vi quickly became a fan-favorite among League of Legends players.

The Arcane Vi skin features a complete visual overhaul, giving Vi a brand new look that perfectly captures the essence of her magical abilities. Her traditional gauntlets are replaced with enchanted gauntlets that crackle with arcane energy. The gauntlets glow with a vibrant blue hue, symbolizing the raw power that Vi possesses.

Vi's armor has also been upgraded to reflect her newfound magical prowess. She now wears a sleek, form-fitting suit that is adorned with intricate arcane symbols. The suit shimmers with magical energy, further emphasizing Vi's connection to the arcane arts. Her iconic goggles have been replaced with a mystical visor that enhances her vision and allows her to tap into the arcane energies around her.

One of the most striking features of the Arcane Vi skin is her new ability effects. Her Q ability, Vault Breaker, now leaves behind a trail of arcane energy as she charges towards her enemies. Upon impact, the energy explodes in a dazzling display of magical power. Her W ability, Denting Blows, causes her gauntlets to glow even brighter, leaving no doubt about the immense strength behind her punches.

Vi's E ability, Excessive Force, unleashes a wave of arcane energy that ripples through her enemies, leaving them stunned and vulnerable. Finally, her R ability, Assault and Battery, transforms her into a swirling vortex of arcane power as she charges towards her target, dealing devastating damage upon impact.

Not only does Arcane Vi feature stunning visual effects, but it also includes new sound effects that further enhance the skin's magical theme. From the crackling of her gauntlets to the resonating hum of her abilities, every sound immerses players in the world of arcane magic.

Vi, the Piltover Enforcer, is a powerful champion known for her brute strength and relentless determination. With her massive gauntlets and unyielding spirit, she fights to maintain order in the city of Piltover and protect its citizens from the chaos that threatens to consume it.

Vi's past in the game is deeply intertwined with the lore of Piltover and its sister city, Zaun. She was once a member of the Wardens, a group of enforcers tasked with maintaining order in Piltover. However, Vi's rebellious nature and her desire for justice often clashed with the strict rules of the Wardens.

Eventually, Vi left the Wardens and formed a partnership with Caitlyn, the Sheriff of Piltover. Together, they became a formidable duo, fighting against the criminal underworld that plagued the city. Vi's brute strength and unwavering determination made her a force to be reckoned with, and she quickly gained a reputation as one of Piltover's most feared enforcers.

In the game, Vi is classified as a melee fighter and excels at diving into the heart of the enemy team, disrupting their formation, and dealing massive damage. Her Q ability, Vault Breaker, allows her to charge up a powerful punch and dash towards her target, knocking them up and dealing damage. Her W ability, Denting Blows, empowers her next three basic attacks, causing them to deal bonus damage and shred the target's armor.

Vi's E ability, Excessive Force, is an area-of-effect ability that deals damage to all enemies in a cone in front of her. It also applies a stack of Denting Blows to all enemies hit, further increasing her damage output. Finally, her R ability, Assault and Battery, allows her to dash towards a target enemy champion, knocking them up and dealing massive damage. This ability can be a game-changer in team fights, as it allows Vi to isolate and eliminate high-priority targets.

Vi's strengths lie in her ability to engage and lock down high-value targets. With her Q and R abilities, she can quickly close the gap between herself and her enemies, making her a formidable threat in team fights. Her W ability also allows her to shred through tanks and bruisers, making her a versatile pick in a variety of team compositions.

However, Vi does have some weaknesses that players should be aware of. She is heavily reliant on her abilities to deal damage, so if her abilities are on cooldown, she can be vulnerable. Additionally, her lack of ranged abilities makes her susceptible to kiting and poke damage from champions with long-range abilities.

Overall, Vi is a powerful champion with a rich lore and a unique playstyle. Whether you're a fan of her brute strength or her relentless pursuit of justice, Arcane Vi is a skin that perfectly captures her essence. With its stunning visual effects and immersive sound design, this skin is a must-have for any Vi main.

For more information about Vi and her various appearances in League of Legends, be sure to check out the official League of Legends website and watch the champion spotlight videos. Explore the world of Piltover and Zaun, and discover the true power of the Piltover Enforcer.

One of the standout features of the Officer Vi skin is the new voiceover lines. Vi's voice is modified to sound more authoritative and commanding, fitting her role as a law enforcement officer. She has new lines for her abilities, taunts, and interactions with other champions. These voiceover changes add an extra layer of immersion to the skin and make playing as Officer Vi even more enjoyable.

The PROJECT: Vi skin is a futuristic and cybernetic-themed costume for the champion Vi in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on August 1, 2014, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP.
